basic.description: An examination of the genetic link between surficial geological processes and the sedimentary record produced by these processes. Students obtain an integrated overview of the nature and operation of the Earth-surface environment. Topics include origin of sedimentary rocks and their sedimentary structures, depositional environments and stratigraphic successions; stratigraphic principles and their application to sedimentary basins, with implications for hydrocarbon genesis; interaction of natural processes with human society.
basic.subject: GEOE
basic.title: Surficial Proc Sed & Strat

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 151 and registered in BSCE.
